channel.title: Running my client for Windows 7 users
channel.description:
This is my Start Client batch file.
[code]@echo off title Natural Born Killers v2.9 java -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Bot 0 0 lowmem members 32 pause[/code]
How can I change this so Windows 7 users can access it?

item.title: Running my client for Windows 7 users
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Thanks for that. Would rep but bit of a problem with 13 rep lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Running my client for Windows 7 users

item.title: Running my client for Windows 7 users
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

“java -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Bot 0 0 lowmem members 32” change it to:
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Bot 0 0 lowmem members 32"

Read full topic
item.source: Running my client for Windows 7 users

item.title: Running my client for Windows 7 users
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Windows 7 users cannot access the client. It closes itself down.

Read full topic
